payload.name: crdts
payload.title: CRDTs: some state can converge without coordination
payload.formal: CRDTs rely on a join-semilattice ((S,\sqcup)) and monotone updates; eventual convergence is guaranteed.
payload.apm2_mapping: consensus module includes CRDTs. Use CRDTs for *non-critical* shared views: caches, indexes, presence, “best effort” telemetry summaries. Never use CRDTs for authority or money unless you deeply understand the algebra and threat model.
